availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Hunter (Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter, paper hanger and merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter, paper hanger and merchant. New York native. Married to Nancy Steinberg Hunter in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 11, 1860. Carpenter in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1858. Paper hanger in Louisville in 1861. Merchant in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994041, Jefferson County Deaths.
